attributes.action: Apologise on behalf of the British people to the people of Sudan
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: for any hurt caused to them by a U.K citizen naming a teddy-bear Mohammed, and to state publicly that he personally would never name a teddy-bear or other stuffed animal after Mohammed or any other deity, real or oterwise.

reasons: Intended to be humorous, or has no point about government policy
